label: 鎮魂
説明文: A ritual to recall the spirit of the dead or to pacify the spirits of the dead. According to the Yōrō Ritsuryo Code, on the eve of the Harvest Festival (Niinamesai) in the eleventh lunar month, such a ritual was conducted in the royal palace to pray for long life and prosperity for the tennō and the royal family. [養老律令、新嘗祭]
